name: The Michishort Hold - Alpha
description:
The Michishort Hold is a top-down boss rush game where you play as an alchemist that mixes potion to heal the energy of the defending mage. Heal your mage as they fend off the monster that’s forcing its way through the hold, although the monster's target is... YOU

  • Boss rush
  • Dodge enemy attack while gathering resources to mix potions for the mage
  • Easy top-down controls
  • Expanded Castle

//Controls:

W,A,S,D - movements

Left Mouse - Pick Herb/Throw Potion

//Credits
